meanings.definition: The period of time before retirement.
meanings.sent1: During preretirement, many people start planning for their future.
meanings.sent2: My dad is enjoying his preretirement by traveling and spending time with family.
meanings.sent3: In preretirement, my mom jokes that she will finally have time to beat me at chess.
meanings.sent4: The calm before retirement storm, preretirement is a time to reflect and prepare.
meanings.sent5: Preretirement is like the calm sea before the exciting voyage of retirement.

meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring before retirement.
meanings.sent1: She attended a preretirement seminar to learn about financial planning.
meanings.sent2: The preretirement benefits include flexible work hours and additional leave.
meanings.sent3: His preretirement party was a fun celebration with colleagues and friends.
meanings.sent4: The preretirement phase is a crucial time to set goals and make arrangements.
meanings.sent5: Wearing a special pin, she proudly displayed her preretirement status at work.
